data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 30302, Version Hash: db622561b65eae5128bc8eab9db7679a4527c3fb
data.expected_result: Simply, Discord shouldn't lag when I attempt to organize roles
data.short_description: In the "Roles" section with a large number of roles, I experience a great deal of lag when modifying them
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on a server with 200+ dissimilar roles (varying perms/ colors) - Go to "Server Settings," then "Roles" - Attempt to drag one of the roles as of you are organizing them and/or edit permissions
